/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban scene below. Buildings of various sizes and architectural styles line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
